sentence: Although  the  distribution  system  of  the  new  legislative  power  in  Iraq  had  generally  taken  care  of  the  interests  of  all  parties  ,  and  found  a  relatively  reasonable  balance  point  among  all  ethnic  groups  and  sects  --  otherwise  a  management  committee  ,  the  interim  constitution  ,  and  the  current  interim  government  would  not  have  been  successfully  generated  --  this  does  not  mean  that  there  were  no  contradictions  among  them  .

sentence: Although  under  the  balance  of  interests  some  of  Sunni  political  figures  were  involved  in  politics  ,  what  the  Sunni  radical  groups  were  most  concerned  about  was  that  the  Shiites  would  turn  around  and  suppress  them  in  the  future  .

sentence: In  February  of  this  year  ,  a  radical  Sunni  organization  attacked  the  Ali  Mosque  ,  which  is  the  religious  shrine  of  Shiite  Muslims  ,  and  this  led  to  the  eruption  of  the  conflict  between  Iraq  's  two  largest  parties  .
